page.title: 13BUSINESS IN ST.NINIANS
page.content: There are many kinds of{employment}in the St.Ninians Block. Most of the businesses are small but a few of them are quite large.The biggest firm is {Cape Insulation.}There is also a lot of unemployment around. All those who don't have a job go and look around the job centre. The most popular type of job is a policeman and the most unpopular job is a street sweeper or a refuse collector. Almost every job needs a special kind of uniform.Most jobs need special tools as well as uniforms. In the hospital there are lots of people employed. Other jobs in the area are;joiner,Vet, shopkeepers, builder, plumber, social worker and secretaries. The type of employment found in this area makes life pleasanter for everyone. (L.SCOBIE,G.COOK.)
